mapper.insert: insert into up_aitask (up_taskId, up_source, up_createTime, up_startaitime, up_endtime, up_createUserCode, up_status, up_talkTime) values (#{upTaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upStartaitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upCreateusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upTalktime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

up_taskId,
up_source,

mapper.select: select up_taskId, up_source, up_createTime, up_startaitime, up_endtime, up_createUserCode, up_status, up_talkTime from up_aitask where up_taskId = #{up_taskId}
mapper.update: update up_aitask set up_source = #{upSource,jdbcType=CHAR}, up_createTime = #{upCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_startaitime = #{upStartaitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_endtime = #{upEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_createUserCode = #{upCreateusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_status = #{upStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_talkTime = #{upTalktime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where up_taskId = {upTaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
